section.name: Steffen Haulund
section.aboutMeText: With my passion for web development, I strive to create web solutions that match perfectly with users' needs. Ease of use and aesthetic appeal are important to me. My experience ranges from developing web pages for local stores to building enterprise-level SaaS applications. I thrive on responsibility and love seeing my work elevate the client's or user's project.

posts.title: ONGOING CONSULTANT | TCS
points: Frontend Maersk SaaS Project reguarding onboarding of new clients

Full Stack Maersk SaaS Project regaarding a tool for the landside team
